import React from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; const Home = ({ isAuthenticated, user, logout }) => { const isFarmer = user?.userType === 'farmer'; const isRetailer = user?.userType === 'retailer'; return (
Product Tracking using Blockchain
HOME {!isAuthenticated ? ( <> FARMER LOGIN FARMER SIGNUP RETAILER LOGIN RETAILER SIGNUP ) : isFarmer ? ( <> Welcome Farmer, {user?.name} DASHBOARD ) : ( <> Welcome, {user?.storeName} DASHBOARD )}

Product Tracking using Blockchain

Track your products from farm to consumer with blockchain technology

{!isAuthenticated && (

For Farmers

Farmer Signup Farmer Login

For Retailers

Retailer Signup Retailer Login
)}
); }; export default Home;
